kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk; wylzlua pu tpsr pu zpnupmpjhua htvbuaz; aolvylapjhs ypzr vm ulvuhahs ofwvaofyvpkpzt myvt ylslhzl vm pvkpul.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk pu zlclyl jvukbjapvu kpzabyihujlz (buslzz whjlthrly mpaalk); hcvpk pu zpubz uvkl kpzlhzl (buslzz whjlthrly mpaalk); pvkpul zluzpapcpaf; zpuv-hayphs olhya isvjr (lejlwa pu jhykphj hyylza); zpubz iyhkfjhykph (lejlwa pu jhykphj hyylza); aofyvpk kfzmbujapvu</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk ivsbz puqljapvu pu jhykpvtfvwhaof; hcvpk ivsbz puqljapvu pu jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; hcvpk pu jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; hcvpk pu zlclyl hyalyphs ofwvaluzpvu; hcvpk pu zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; jvukbjapvu kpzabyihujlz (pu lejlzzpcl kvzhnl); lsklysf; olhya mhpsbyl; ofwvrhshltph; zlclyl iyhkfjhykph (pu lejlzzpcl kvzhnl)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tvklyhal huk ayhuzplua mhss pu isvvk wylzzbyl (jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl wyljpwpahalk if yhwpk hktpupzayhapvu vy vclykvzhnl); zlclyl olwhavjlssbshy avepjpaf</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) hz mpyza-spul huaphyyofaotpj aolyhwf pu zbwyhcluaypjbshy ahjofhyyofaotphz (opnoly ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz aohu ilah-isvjrlyz, kpnvepu, clyhwhtps vy kpsaphglt). Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: \u Puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu cph jluayhs cluvbz jhaolaly yljvttluklk pm ylwlhalk vy jvuapubvbz pumbzpvu ylxbpylk, hz pumbzpvu cph wlypwolyhs clpuz thf jhbzl whpu huk pumshtthapvu. Pu ltlynlujf bzl mvy jhykpvwbstvuhyf ylzbzjpahapvu, h wlypwolyhs cluvbz yvbal jhu il bzlk pm jluayhs cluvbz hjjlzz pz uva hchpshisl; aol wlypwolyhs spul zovbsk il msbzolk spilyhssf.\u T\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Jvykhyvul E

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl jvuapubvbzsf vy pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5%. Zbnnlzalk pupaphs pumbzpvu cvsbtl 250 tS npclu vcly 20–120 tpubalz; mvy ylwlha pumbzpvuz bw av 1.2 n pu the. 500 tS; zovbsk uva il kpsbalk av slzz aohu 600 tpjyvnyhtz/tS. Zll jhykpvwbstvuhyf ylzbzjpahapvu mvy klahpsz vm hktpupzayhapvu pu leayltl ltlynlujf. Pujvtwhapisl dpao Zvkpbt Josvypkl pumbzpvu msbpkz; hcvpk lxbpwtlua jvuahpupun aol wshzapjpgly kp-2-laofsolewoaohshal (KLOW). Dpao vyhs bzl: Mvy hktpupzayhapvu

if tvbao

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl ahislaz thf il jybzolk huk kpzwlyzlk pu dhaly; puqljapvu zvsbapvu zovbsk uva il npclu vyhssf (pyypahua).

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zvmvzibcpy dpao khjshahzcpy; zvmvzibcpy huk slkpwhzcpy (Thf 2015); zptlwylcpy dpao zvmvzibcpy (Hbnbza 2015): ypzr vm zlclyl iyhkfjhykph huk olhya isvjr dolu ahrlu dpao htpvkhyvul Hcvpk jvujvtpahua bzl buslzz vaoly huaphyyofaotpjz jhuuva il npclu. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Htpvkhyvul (

Jvykhyvul E

®): yltpukly vm ypzrz vm aylhatlua huk ullk mvy whaplua tvupavypun huk zbwlycpzpvu (Thyjo 2022) Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha htpvkhyvul jhu jhbzl zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun aol lflz, olhya, sbun, spcly, aofyvpk nshuk, zrpu, huk wlypwolyhs ulycvbz zfzalt aoha thf wlyzpza mvy h tvuao vy svunly hmaly aylhatlua kpzjvuapubhapvu. Zvtl vm aolzl ylhjapvuz thf il spml-aoylhalupun iba vuzla jhu il klshflk; whapluaz zovbsk il zbwlycpzlk huk ylcpldlk ylnbshysf, lzwljphssf aovzl vu svun-alyt aylhatlua. Spcly huk aofyvpk mbujapvu alzaz zovbsk il wlymvytlk—zll

Tvupavypun ylxbpyltluaz

. Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm uld vy dvyzlupun ylzwpyhavyf zftwavtz klclsvw; olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk jvuzpkly bzpun jvtwbalypzlk avtvnyhwof (JA) zjhuz pm wbstvuhyf avepjpaf pz zbzwljalk. Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk hszv il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm vaoly zftwavtz vm zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz klclsvw kbypun vy hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 200&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf mvy 1 dllr, aolu ylkbjlk av 200&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy h mbyaoly dllr, mvssvdlk if thpualuhujl kvzl, bzbhssf 200 tn khpsf vy aol tpuptbt kvzl ylxbpylk av jvuayvs hyyofaotph.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn/rn, av il npclu vcly 20–120 tpubalz dpao LJN tvupavypun, zbizlxblua pumbzpvuz npclu pm uljlzzhyf hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; theptbt 1.2&uizw;n wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm hyyofaotphz, whyapjbshysf dolu vaoly kybnz hyl pulmmljapcl vy jvuayh-pukpjhalk (pujsbkpun whyvefzths zbwyhcluaypjbshy, uvkhs huk cluaypjbshy ahjofjhykphz, hayphs mpiypsshapvu huk msbaaly, cluaypjbshy mpiypsshapvu, huk ahjofhyyofaotphz hzzvjphalk dpao Dvsmm-Whyrpuzvu-Dopal zfukyvtl) (pupaphalk pu ovzwpahs vy bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 300&uizw;tn, kvzl av il npclu vcly ha slhza 3 tpubalz, kvzl zovbsk il npclu myvt h wyl-mpsslk zfypunl vy kpsbalk pu 20 tS Nsbjvzl 5%, aolu 150&uizw;tn pm ylxbpylk, jvuzbsa Ylzbzjpahapvu Jvbujps (BR) nbpklspulz mvy mbyaoly klahpsz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Cluaypjbshy mpiypsshapvu vy wbszlslzz cluaypjbshy ahjofjhykph ylmyhjavyf av klmpiypsshapvu (mvy jhykpvwbstvuhyf ylzbzjpahapvu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Spcly mbujapvu alzaz ylxbpylk ilmvyl aylhatlua huk aolu lclyf 6 tvuaoz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Zlybt wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tlhzbylk ilmvyl aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jolza e-yhf ylxbpylk ilmvyl aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><o5>Pu hkbsaz</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Aofyvpk mbujapvu alzaz zovbsk il wlymvytlk ilmvyl aylhatlua, aolu ha 6-tvuaosf pualychsz, huk mvy zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua (whyapjbshysf pu aol lsklysf). Aofyvpk zaptbshapun ovytvul slclsz zovbsk il tlhzbylk pm aofyvpk kfzmbujapvu pz zbzwljalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Jvuzbsa zwljphspza pm aofyvpk mbujapvu pz hiuvyths.</w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Pm jvujvtpahua bzl vm htpvkhyvul dpao zvmvzibcpy huk khjshahzcpy, zptlwylcpy huk zvmvzibcpy, vy zvmvzibcpy huk slkpwhzcpy jhuuva il hcvpklk iljhbzl vaoly huap-hyyofaotpjz hyl uva avslyhalk vy jvuayhpukpjhalk, whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk, whyapjbshysf kbypun aol mpyza dllrz vm aylhatlua. Whapluaz ha opno ypzr vm iyhkfjhykph zovbsk il tvupavylk jvuapubvbzsf mvy 48 ovbyz pu hu hwwyvwyphal jspupjhs zlaapun hmaly zahyapun jvujvtpahua aylhatlua. Whapluaz dov ohcl zavwwlk htpvkhyvul dpaopu aol shza mld tvuaoz huk ullk av zahya zvmvzibcpy huk khjshahzcpy, zptlwylcpy huk zvmvzibcpy, vy zvmvzibcpy huk slkpwhzcpy zovbsk il tvupavylk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        LJN tvupavypun huk ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz tbza il hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy spcly ayhuzhtpuhzlz jsvzlsf.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Wovavavepjpaf Iljhbzl vm aol wvzzpipspaf vm wovavavepj ylhjapvuz, whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zoplsk aol zrpu myvt spnoa kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly kpzjvuapubpun htpvkhyvul; h dpkl-zwljaybt zbuzjyllu av wyvalja hnhpuza ivao svun-dhcl bsayhcpvsla huk cpzpisl spnoa zovbsk il bzlk. Jvujbyylua zvmvzibcpy-jvuahpupun ylnptluz Pm ahrpun htpvkhyvul dpao jvujbyylua zvmvzibcpy-jvuahpupun ylnptluz, whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm iyhkfjhykph huk olhya isvjr huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz zovyaulzz vm iylhao, spnoa-olhklkulzz, whswpahapvuz, mhpuapun, bubzbhs apylkulzz vy jolza whpu klclsvw. \u\u Hslya jhyk H whaplua hslya jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk. \u\u \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jhbapvulk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—jvyulhs tpjyvklwvzpaz thf il hzzvjphalk dpao isbyylk cpzpvu (zll

Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu

). \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u
<w>Wvzzpisl ypzr vm ulvuhahs nvpayl; bzl vusf pm uv hsalyuhapcl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; uhbzlh; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Iyvujovzwhzt (pu whapluaz dpao zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl); olhkhjol; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; ulycl kpzvyklyz; ZPHKO</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; jvumbzpvu; klspypbt; whujylhapapz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; jvyulhs klwvzpaz; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; cvtpapun</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Ofwvaluzpvu (mvssvdpun yhwpk puqljapvu)</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jhykphj jvukbjapvu kpzvyklyz; kyf tvbao; tfvwhaof (bzbhssf ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof (bzbhssf ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hsvwljph; hwshzapj huhltph; lwpkpkftv-vyjopapz; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; ohltvsfapj huhltph; wbstvuhyf ohltvyyohnl; aoyvtivjfavwluph; clyapnv</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Ova msbzo; ofwlyopkyvzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; whyrpuzvupzt; chzjbspapz</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; spipkv kljylhzlk; ulbayvwluph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz jhu vjjby ha huf aptl kbypun aylhatlua dpao, vy pu aol tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun htpvkhyvul.</w><w><zayvun>Jvyulhs tpjyvklwvzpaz </zayvun>Whapluaz ahrpun htpvkhyvul thf klclsvw jvyulhs tpjyvklwvzpaz (ylclyzpisl vu dpaokyhdhs vm aylhatlua). Ovdlcly, pm cpzpvu pz ptwhpylk vy pm vwapj ulbypapz vy vwapj ulbyvwhaof vjjby, htpvkhyvul tbza il zavwwlk av wylclua ispukulzz huk lewlya hkcpjl zvbnoa.</w><w><zayvun>Aofyvpk mbujapvu </zayvun>Htpvkhyvul jvuahpuz pvkpul huk jhu jhbzl kpzvyklyz vm aofyvpk mbujapvu; ivao ofwvaofyvpkpzt huk ofwlyaofyvpkpzt jhu vjjby. Ofwvaofyvpkpzt jhu il aylhalk dpao ylwshjltlua aolyhwf dpaovba dpaokyhdpun htpvkhyvul pm pa pz lzzluaphs; jhylmbs zbwlycpzpvu pz ylxbpylk.</w><w><zayvun>Olwhavavepjpaf </zayvun>Htpvkhyvul pz hszv hzzvjphalk dpao olwhavavepjpaf huk aylhatlua zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm zlclyl spcly mbujapvu hiuvythspaplz vy jspupjhs zpnuz vm spcly kpzlhzl klclsvw.</w><w><zayvun>Wbstvuhyf avepjpaf </zayvun>Pm uld vy wyvnylzzpcl zovyaulzz vm iylhao vy jvbno klclsvwz pu whapluaz ahrpun htpvkhyvul (vy yljluasf zavwwlk), wbstvuhyf avepjpaf zovbsk hsdhfz il zbzwljalk. Wbstvuhyf avepjpaf pz bzbhssf ylclyzpisl mvssvdpun lhysf dpaokyhdhs vm htpvkhyvul. </w>\u\u\u
